mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stadium_owner(stadium_owner_id, password, representative, company_name, address, taxpayer_id, account_bank_id, account_number, point) VALUES (#{stadiumOwnerId}, #{password}, #{representative}, #{companyName}, #{address}, #{taxpayerId}, #{accountBankId}, #{accountNumber}, #{point})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM stadium_owner WHERE stadium_owner_id = #{stadiumOwnerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE stadium_owner SET representative = #{request.representative}, company_name = #{request.companyName}, address = #{request.address}, taxpayer_id = #{request.taxpayerId}, account_bank_id = #{request.accountBankId}, account_number = #{request.accountNumber}, updated_at=now() WHERE stadium_owner_id = #{target}
UPDATE stadium_owner SET password = #{password}, updated_at=now() WHERE stadium_owner_id = #{stadiumOwnerId}
